tabConvertExtract.Name: File Extract/Convert to ISO
tabConvertExtract.labelOpenOrDragFile: Open or drag a file to convert or extract

tabDiskToISO.Name: CD/DVD Disk to ISO
tabDiskToISO.chooseISOOrBinCueImage: Please select ISO or BIN/CUE image file

LiteVersionDialog.LiteVersionLimitText: Lite version of AnyToISO works with CD images only (up to 870 MB). In order to work with larger files (DVD and more) you should Purchase Professional version. You'll obtain the registration code unlocking the software after the purchase.

EnterKeyDialog.Caption: Enter Registration Code
EnterKeyDialog.EnterKeyToUpgradeText: Please enter your registration details to upgrade to Pro version of AnyToISO.

AboutDialog.Caption: About AnyToISO
AboutDialog.CopyRight: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized duplication or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil or criminal penalties.

NewVersionDialog.Caption: AnyToISO Update
NewVersionDialog.NewVersionAvailable: A new version %1 of AnyToISO is available. Do you want to download it now?

PreferencesDialog.Caption: Preferences
PreferencesDialog.CheckForNewVersions: Check for new version on startup
PreferencesDialog.ShellExtensionInfo: Add context menus for optical drives, folders and files of supported formats.

PasswordDialog.Caption: Password required
PasswordDialog.FileIsProtected: The file is encrypted. In order to decrypt please enter the password:

Messages.Question: Question
Messages.NotEnoughDiskSpace: It looks like there's not enough free disk space (only %1) on the selected drive. \n\nDo you wish to proceed?
Messages.ISOAlreadyExists: Destination ISO file\n%1\nalready exists, do you wish to overwrite it?
Messages.FolderAlreadyExists: Destination folder\n%1\nalready exists, do you wish to overwrite all existing files with the same name?
Messages.RestartProgram: To complete registration you must restart the program. \n\nDo you wish to do it now?
Messages.CancelOperation: Are you sure you want to terminate current operation?

StatusMessages.ConvertingToTemporaryISO: Converting to a temporary ISO file...
StatusMessages.CannotOpenDestFile: Unable to open destination file, please check the file name and access rights
StatusMessages.ClickToOpenISOInExplorer: Click here to open the output ISO file in Explorer
StatusMessages.ClickToMountISOInFinder: Click here to mount the ISO in Finder
StatusMessages.ClickToOpenOutFolder: Click here to open the output folder

DiskToISO.CannotCreateFromAudio: You cannot create ISO image of a multi-session disk or an Audio Disk, please contact support for assistance.
DiskToISO.PleaseUseBinCue: Please use BIN/CUE image for such disks
DiskToISO.ReadError: Read error %1, please contact support for assistance
DiskToISO.DeviceIsCopyProtected: This device is copy-protected and the sector is encrypted. Cannot continue.
DiskToISO.CannotReadDiskToc: Failed to read TOC (table of contents) of the disk
DiskToISO.DiskNotPresent: Disk not present or unknown media type
DiskToISO.NoTracksOnDisk: There are no tracks on the disk, it's probably blank
DiskToISO.WritingTrack: Writing track %1, track length is %2 sectors
DiskToISO.TrackReadingStopped: Reading stopped at %1, resuming with next track

FolderToISO.SkippingBigFile: Skipping file '%1'. It's bigger than 4 GB
FolderToISO.BigFileWarning: File '%1' is bigger than 4 GB and will not be visible in ISO 9660 file system.
FolderToISO.NestedDirectoriesLimitWarning: Directory structure is deeper than %1 levels, some files and folders will be skipped.
FolderToISO.UnableToOpenFile: Unable to open file '%1' for read access.

UniversalConverter.AudioCDWarning: The image is a %1 Audio CD image, conversion to ISO is not possible. You can extract all audio tracks to a folder.
UniversalConverter.NotValidImage: Error: This is not a valid CD/DVD image
UniversalConverter.CannotFindSignature: Error: cannot find ISO_9660 signature, reached 5 MB limit
UniversalConverter.MultiSessionNotSupported: The disk image is a multi-session disk image. Such images are not supported.

NrgConverter.NrgParsingError: NRG parsing error, please contact support for assistance
NrgConverter.NoSessionsFound: No NRG sessions detected, please contact support for assistance

ExtractISO.ChooseISOFS: There're multiple filesystems in this ISO image, please choose one of them to extract:
ExtractISO.InvalidISO: The file is not a valid ISO image or is not currently supported

UIFConverter.UsingLZMA: Using Lzma decompression by Igor Pavlov
UIFConverter.MixedImageFound: Mixed image type %1 found, uncompressing to a temporary file...

DebExtract.NotValidDeb: The file is not a valid Debian (Ubuntu) Linux archive

RpmExtract.DecompressingPayload: Decompressing %1 payload to a temporary file...

DMG.ExtractingMainPartition: Extracting main DMG partition to a temporary file, this can take some time - please wait...
DMG.NoVolumeFound: No volume found, looking for HFS+ file system...
DMG.CorruptedOrPasswordProtected: Error: corrupted or password protected DMG image
DMG.XarArchiveDetected: DMG file is actually a XAR archive (normally with actual DMG file inside) that can be only extracted. Please choose extract operation to proceed

PDIConverter.InvalidOrBrokenImage: Invalid or broken InstantCopy PDI image

ISZConverter.WarningPassword: Specifying an invalid password will make the output file invalid

XarUnpacker.NestedArchiveFound: Extracted file '%1' can be unpacked separately as %2 archive (append extension manually)

ShellExtension.ConvertToISOInfo: Convert disk image file to ISO format
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromFolderInfo: Create ISO image of this folder with default options
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromFolderWithOptionsInfo: Create ISO image of this folder with specifying file system options and volume label
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromDisk: Create ISO image of this disk
ShellExtension.CreateISOFromDiskInfo: Create ISO image of a selected optical disk
ShellExtension.CreateBINCUEFromDisk: Create BIN/CUE image of this disk
ShellExtension.CreateBINCUEFromDiskInfo: Create BIN (raw) image of a selected optical disk and its corresponding CUE sheet file

UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailable: A new version of %1 is available!
UpdateChecker.NewVersionAvailableText: %1 %2 is now available - you have %3. Would you like to download it now?
UpdateChecker.MessageNoUpdateAvailableDescription: %1 %2 is currently the newest version available.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorConnect: An error occurred while downloading the update. Please try again later.
UpdateChecker.MessageErrorParse: An error occurred while parsing the update feed.
